item.title: [PI] Theiving Stall Rewards
item.dc:creator: @Turmoilz1337x Turmoilz1337x
item.description:
@Turmoilz1337x wrote:

Okay So Here is My Current Code:

c.sendMessage("You attempt to steal something from the stall..."); c.getItems().addItem(995, c.playerLevel[c.playerThieving] * 200); c.startAnimation(832); c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp * Config.THIEVING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerThieving); c.lastThieve = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.sendMessage("You Steal Some " + server.model.items.Item.getItemName(id) + "."); } else if(c.playerLevel[17] < level) { c.sendMessage("You need a theiving level of "+level+" to steal from this stall."); } }

How Would I Make The Reward Increase As They Went Through Higher Theiving Stalls? It’s Currently The Same Amount of Rewards For Any Stall, and Only Progresses With Your Level…Help?

Yeah. I Suck At Coding To Begin With So Don’t Hate.

Read full topic
